message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and quality, it is worth $1200000 to you. Considering this, I propose to sell the product to you at a special introductory price of $1350000. This offer represents a significant saving compared to its market value, providing you with a unique chance to benefit from our product at an attractive price. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to serve you.
